item.title: By: Andrea
item.dc:creator: Andrea
item.description: I'm now experimenting on this topic and I found your interesting post. Before reading I used a mapping like $x + (1/3) sign(x) abs(x)^n$, for a scaled range -1 < x < 1, with n > 1, for example to grow a 4:3 1920x1440 image to a 16:9 2560x1440 image (the inverse can be used to shrink the height also). What do you think about my approach?
